title: What is wrong my server?
body: My computer had a update on it and after that I cant play League of legends. It says that PvP.NET server is not responding. It then says checking for a problem then says is not responding and close program. What do I do? Do I just redownload it or do I just wait for a new solution to pop up? Please get back with me cuz if I want to make the pros this isn't helping me.{{champion:120}}

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a problem staying connected to the server and causing you to disconnect from pvp.net.  As a first step, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and thwart whatever is causing the d/c.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up but let me know!
